title: Unencrypted Credentials
description:
In this captured HTTP traffic, what password was sent in cleartext?

POST /login HTTP/1.1
Host: vulnerable-site.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 38

username=admin&password=SuperSecret123

Submit as: flag{password}
hints: HTTP (not HTTPS) transmits data in plaintext
Look at the POST body for form parameters
The password= parameter contains the answer
